description:
Nagatomi Rikiei is the leader of the Nagatomi yakuza, ruthless and ambitious. He enlists http://anidb.net/ch4865 [Mugen] as his partner after the former impresses him by sitting at his men`s table, eating their food and beating them up. Keeps a chinstrap and sports Ray-Bans, a distinguishing part of his appearance. Killed by his personal yojimbo http://anidb.net/ch17598 [Ishimatsu] for his wicked ways after Ishimatsu decides enough is enough.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Nagatomi Rikiei
